body: I'm not a dog nutritionist There appears to be what I believe is some sort of chicken jerky in the mix.  I think this is what makes this so appealing to my current dogs (two 50-ish lb. Aussies).  I'm not an amateur K9 nutritionist like so many claim to be, but over my 30+ years of dog ownership I've fed my dogs just about every brand of food on the market.  I have not had a dog die prematurely for any reason other than old age (typically 15-16 yrs).  So I don't buy into all these advertised health claims as it pertains to things like 'more energy, shiny coats, longer life, better digestion etc etc etc).  I simply choose a reputable brand of food that my dogs enjoy with good value and go with it.  All that being said, this is by far a larger volume of food in a 40lb bag that most others of the same weight.  By volume I mean 40lbs of this stuff takes up more space than most other brands.  If you transfer the contents from the bag into lidded 5-gal food grade buckets like I do, just know that 2 buckets is not enough.  You'll need 3.
subject: Purina ONE Natural Dog Food, SmartBlend Chicken and Rice Dog Food Formula - 31.1 lb. Bag

body: Larvae Maggots We've been using this product for both our two dogs, boxer and boston terrier, for years now and never had an issue.  Our dogs love the food/flavor and it works for.both our large and small.dog.  We have the subscription service currently in place.  The current bag we had opened we didn't notice any issues, until recently we started finding what appeared to be maggots on our pantry/near where we keep the dog food.  Of course we freaked out because we aren't dirty people and it made us sick.  We inspected everything including the dogs, cleaned everything we possibly could think of, and didn't initially find the source until just yesterday. I noticed small webs in the actual bag of dog food, and after doing some research it appears to be pantry moth eggs and larvae/maggots that were in the dry dog food.  We immediately threw it all out which sucks because it was almost a full bag and wasn't cheap because we get the large 31 lb bags.  Luckily, we were able to get another bag right away from the store.  I inspected the new bag, and it appears to be okay.  I am pretty upset bc our boxer has been acting sickly/ having watery BMs ever since that bag was opened. I don't know if we should wean them off the brand, stop the subscription and buy local, or what?  I am pretty upset tho, not only for losing the money, but for having to deal with the gross infestation and for my poor pup having issues.
subject: Purina ONE Natural Dog Food, SmartBlend Chicken and Rice Dog Food Formula - 31.1 lb. Bag
